TopicTitle: KSP Academy Double Canoe Mk IIa Planar

Articles.Content:
This is a slightly reworked version of DasValdez's Double Canoe craft from KSP Academy. This version has reworked lander probes and a spaceplane as the Conning Tower. As an added bonus, it includes the launch setup to 100km. I've tested it and it works beautifully.

Here is an album from the launch test.

Get the file Here

Bad embed code. Bad, bad.
True, are the new landers command seats or probes? Not a bad idea for landing drills!
